subject: RE: Changes to PIP website
preview: Hi Tim, Confirming we have reset the SFTP password.

full_threads.body:
Hi Tim,

Confirming we have reset the SFTP password.

Hi Kyle-Ben,

Thanks for the confirmation. Heath, you can reset the SFTP password.

Kind Regards,

Tim Morgan

Head of Technology & Transformation



E: tim@sgua.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hey Tim,

Please give it a reset :) I'm done - the caching issue also seems to be fixed too.

Hi Kyle-Ben,

Please advise if you are completed with the SFTP access? If so, Heath will reset the password.

Kind Regards,

Tim Morgan

Head of Technology & Transformation



E: tim@sgua.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.
Seems to be all good - will try again in 24 hours and see what happens - hopefully it's all good :)

Hi Kyle-Ben,

Can you please try now? There was some CDN Edge caching in place. Perhaps this was causing the issue?

Hey guys,

I was able to change the description to remove SGUA Portal, see attached.

However, I still had an issue with the caching. I had to clear the cache.

We need to verify the user is using the form from the frontend and we use a nonce to protect the endpoint, otherwise we could be exposing an endpoint openly and that has the potential for some bad things. The problem is, the page is responding with an old nonce, because of the cache, and the endpoint can't be reached, resulting in no response and a confused user.

The nonce is generated on the page - we just need to make sure caching is disabled for https://www.pi-plus.com.au/paybill/ entirely.

But other than that is everything good to go?

Hi Tim,

I have reset the details, and double checked, you should be fine with these details:

IP Address: 34.126.198.140
Port: 31789
Username: propertyinsuranceplus
Password: c4eHdxEVJvNPqjj

Please let me know once you are done and I will reset the password.

Hi Heath,

Thanks for confirming the Port Number, now getting authentication error utilising the credentials shared.



Tim Morgan

Head of Technology & Transformation



E: tim@sgua.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Tim,

Please use 31789 as the port number.

Hi Heath,

Thank you for providing the SFTP details, tested locally and I'm unable to FTP or SFTP to 34.126.198.140 using the credentials.

Please advise. Thanks.



Tim Morgan

Head of Technology & Transformation



E: tim@sgua.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Tim and Kyle-Ben,

I just did a test and was able to proceed to the payment page with no issues. But, we have now also excluded https://www.pi-plus.com.au/paybill/ from caching.

Also here is a link to the SFTP details:
https://share.1password.com/s#-uUIqnj4AFWm6_zLX-Spt6sX5BktxMYPezN35DS6G48

Please let us know if we can help in any other way?

Hello,

This is an urgent request - can you please get back to me today?

Tim Morgan

Head of Technology & Transformation



E: tim@sgua.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

What I have found though is that the cache of the site is directly related to this new issue. We use a wordpress nonce to verify the user is genuine before the form submits. If I clear the cache and try to submit the form it works, but we can't click clear cache every few hours - we fixed this on the sgua site by disabling cache on https://sgua.com.au/paybill I believe? I'm not actually sure.

Could we set this up on pip-plus.com as well? Maybe have a look at the cache settings on sgua.

I do still require ftp to change the title that appears on the payment page.

Hello,

As Sree is currently on leave can you please share the password details with me.

Kind Regards,

Tim Morgan

Head of Technology & Transformation



E: tim@sgua.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hey Tim,

We still need sftp details to do this - Wolfiq sent something to get a new password for the SFTP details. I'm on leave starting on Thursday until the 3rd. If we can get these details by today I should be able to fix this.

Hi Kyle-Ben,

We require your attention to investigate a HIGH PRIORITY issue affecting our online payment page.

https://www.pi-plus.com.au/paybill/

It may be related to the changes mentioned in this email thread, customers are not being directed to the Payment portal when they click the 'PAY' button on the above webpage.

Please confirm receipt of this email as well as any updates as they come to hand.

Note: Sree is currently on leave so direct any responses back to this email thread.

Kind Regards,

Tim Morgan

Head of Technology & Transformation



E: tim@sgua.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hey Sree,

Did you manage to get these details?

Hi Sree,

Yes sure, please visit this link:
https://share.1password.com/s#fDD_ICUSGdea11pz2ZoLS2M1rTjiTTfsGcuPUdFPwLg

You will need to verify your email address, and then you will be able access the SFTP details.

Sent from my Mobile. KB Snyders
